snippet: The delivery of bills to New York State lawmakers on tablets or laptop computers requires a constitutional amendment, which the Legislature will put before voters on the statewide ballot next year.
abstract: New York Legislature will put constitutional amendment on ballot in 2014 to allow for delivery of bills to lawmakers on tablets or laptop computers; amendment is needed in order to allow Legislature to publish bills electronically and save millions of pages of paper a year.
lead_paragraph: The delivery of bills to New York State lawmakers on tablets or laptop computers requires a constitutional amendment, which the Legislature will put before voters on the statewide ballot next year.

headline.main: Albany, Long Buried in Paper, Resolves to Save a Small Forest
headline.print_headline: Albany, Long Buried in Paper, Resolves to Save a Small Forest
